room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: Terrible venue. They start the clock exactly on the hour and end the room exactly on the hour. Get caught in a Florida thunderstorm while driving an hour to visit the venue? Too bad, you lose 10 minutes. The hour is up and you're literally 5 minutes from finishing the room? Too bad, you need to stop playing immediately even if they don't have another group scheduled after you. After 25+ escape rooms I've been to I've never seen such disgusting customer service.

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: Today was my first time doing an escape room. My friends and I had a really good time. This place uses technology to make the overall experience very creative and interactive. We did the Abandoned Zombie Lab, and it was such a fun experience. I would definitely do another room at this location.

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: We choose to do the Abandoned Zombie Lab. This was definitely a fun time we had to analyze, search and use quick thinking to beat the 1 hour clock. We won with 3 mins to spear and only needed to ask Jo for 1 clue. Our team consisted of myself (The mom), my two sons who are 18 and 21 years old and my sister.

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: I've completed all four rooms avaliable, and I can say they were the best I've ever played! Hard to choose a favorite between the zombie and prison. The decorations support the story, and the zombie lab also has creepy music that keeps you on your toes! The puzzles are challenging, but not impossible, and the staff are always ready to help out with a clue when you've hit a tough spot. Overall a great experience, and I will be back when the new rooms open!

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: We had a blast. It was challenging and fun. We did the zombie room with 4 people and it was a perfectly fun evening! I highly recommend it. Thanks Nicky, you were a great host.

room_title: Escape room "Abandoned Zombie Lab" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: Jo was the best host!! It was amazing, fun and a great mental workout! We saved the world in the Abandoned Zombie Lab and next we are going back for the Bunker!
